00016     const Mat& rotMatrX, const Mat& rotMatrY, const Mat& rotMatrZ, const Mat& eulerAngles)
00017 {
00018     mxArray* p = mxCreateStructMatrix(1,1,7,_fieldnames);
00019     if (!p)
00020         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Allocation error");

00038 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00039                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00040 {
00041     // Check the number of arguments
00042     if (nrhs!=1 || nlhs>1)
00043         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00044     
00045     // Argument vector
00046     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00047     
00048     // Process
00049     Mat projMatrix(rhs[0].toMat(CV_32F));
00050     Mat cameraMatrix, rotMatrix, transVect, rotMatrX, rotMatrY, rotMatrZ, eulerAngles;
00051     decomposeProjectionMatrix(projMatrix, cameraMatrix, rotMatrix, transVect,
00052         rotMatrX, rotMatrY, rotMatrZ, eulerAngles);
00053     plhs[0] = valueStruct(cameraMatrix, rotMatrix, transVect, rotMatrX,
00054         rotMatrY, rotMatrZ, eulerAngles);
00055 }
